pro test_transmission WL_RANGE = [400.,2000.0] WL_STEP = 0.5 NWL = (WL_RANGE[1] - WL_RANGE[0])/WL_STEP WAVELENGTHS = (WL_STEP*FINDGEN(NWL))+WL_RANGE[0] TO3 = GET_OZONE_TRANSMISSION(WAVELENGTHS,VERBOSE=VERBOSE) TWV = GET_WVAP_TRANSMISSION(WAVELENGTHS,VERBOSE=VERBOSE) TGS = GET_GASEOUS_TRANSMISSION(WAVELENGTHS,VERBOSE=VERBOSE) ozone = 300. wvap = 2. TOA_sza = 45.0 TOA_vza = 45.0 TRANS_HYPER = COMPUTE_TRANSMISSION(TO3,OZONE,TWV,WVAP,TGS,TOA_SZA,TOA_VZA) stop end
